original_text: And all the angels were standing around the throne and around the elders and the four living creatures, and they fell on their faces before the throne and worshiped God,
korean_text: 모든 천사가 보좌와 장로들과 네 생물의 주위에 서 있다가 보좌 앞에 엎드려 얼굴을 대고 하나님께 경배하여

sentences.original_text: And all the angels were standing around the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 천사들이 보좌 주위에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and they fell on their faces
